data.lyric:
[ti:Flex (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G/Juice WRLD]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Flex (Explicit) - Polo G/Juice WRLD
[00:00.73]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/Chauncey Hollis/Jarad A. Higgins
[00:01.83]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Chauncey Hollis/Jarad A. Higgins
[00:02.93]Polo G：
[00:03.18]Mm-mm-mm mm-mm-mm
[00:05.67]Hit-Boy
[00:06.85]Mm-mm-mm mm-mm-mm
[00:10.98]Natural born hustler n***a stuntin' is my strong suit
[00:13.90]Flexin' with a hundred cash look at what these songs do
[00:16.85]Gangster and a baller baby I do what I want to
[00:19.71]I be with some steppers I don't care 'bout what you gon' do
[00:22.67]Wet s**t like the Warriors all my n***as gon' shoot
[00:25.60]He gon' have to take a loss some my n***as gone too
[00:28.72]I know a bad b***h and I'm who she belong to
[00:31.43]I just picked a Cuban up from Wafi b***h these stones new
[00:34.30]Dolce& Gabbanas on my feet and these my favorite pair
[00:37.26]Got a lot to lose still can't be scared to take it there
[00:40.27]I was in them slums s**t get dreadful like some Haitian hair
[00:43.07]I come from that zoo it's just cobras pigs and apes in there
[00:46.06]1300 block b***h I caught my last cases there
[00:49.06]Ain't no second chances in this s**t so we can't play it fair
[00:51.95]Foenem line s**t like a barber Glock knock off his facial hair
[00:54.80]Caught him lackin' in his whip they tryna find his face in there
[00:57.78]Lil Hop Out he stay on go b***h all he know is green light
[01:00.75]Let off shots with accuracy showed 'em what that beam like
[01:03.62]Posted by that liquor store was sellin' what the fiends like
[01:06.53]Used to wake up in low income now I live a dream life
[01:09.49]Natural born hustler n***a stuntin' is my strong suit
[01:12.40]Flexin' with a hundred cash look at what these songs do
[01:15.34]Gangster and a baller baby I do what I want to
[01:18.28]I be with some steppers I don't care 'bout what you gon' do
[01:21.21]Wet s**t like the Warriors all my n***as gon' shoot
[01:24.07]He gon' have to take a loss some my n***as gone too
[01:27.12]I know a bad b***h and I'm who she belong to
[01:29.90]I just picked a Cuban up from Wafi b***h these stones new
[01:32.59]Juice WRLD：
[01:32.93]Bury me like a pharaoh with this money and my gold too
[01:35.84]Keep a shooter in there try to rob me this the wrong tune
[01:38.81]I hit Johnny Dang and mixed the diamonds with the gold tooth
[01:41.51]The FN sing a song like it's the leader of a soul group
[01:44.40]Don't come 'round here like we friends you know I don't know you
[01:47.56]You know I got demons allow me to show you
[01:50.43]Lately I been on the road
[01:51.81]Yeah
[01:51.97]Show after show
[01:53.19]I know I'm makin' all the opps mad back home
[01:55.98]Been a while since I had to dial from a trap phone
[01:58.85]See you later alligator quite a while crocodile we gone
[02:02.55]Pray to God that my money stay long
[02:04.79]Also prayin' for good aim for when the devil try to go
[02:07.61]Polo G：
[02:08.00]Natural born hustler n***a stuntin' is my strong suit
[02:10.99]Flexin' with a hundred cash look at what these songs do
[02:13.81]Gangster and a baller baby I do what I want to
[02:16.79]I be with some steppers I don't care 'bout what you gon' do
[02:19.76]Wet s**t like the Warriors all my n***as gon' shoot
[02:22.63]He gon' have to take a loss some my n***as gone too
[02:25.71]I know a bad b***h and I'm who she belong to
[02:28.54]I just picked a Cuban up from Wafi b***h these stones new
data.trans:
[ti:Flex (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G/Juice WRLD]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.73]//
[00:01.83]//
[00:02.93]//
[00:03.18]//
[00:05.67]Hit-Boy制作
[00:06.85]//
[00:10.98]天生的挣钱大师 兄弟 炫富是我的强项
[00:13.90]掏出百元大钞炫耀一下 看看这些歌多么优秀
[00:16.85]是匪帮 也是大富豪 宝贝 我想做什么做什么
[00:19.71]我身边有很多用枪的狠人 我不在乎你要做什么
[00:22.67]像勇士队一样无畏 我的兄弟们都会勇猛冲锋
[00:25.60]他会尝到失败的滋味 我也失去了一些兄弟
[00:28.72]我认识一个漂亮妞 我是她的主人
[00:31.43]我刚在瓦菲商城买了一条古巴链 碧池 这些钻石都是新买的
[00:34.30]杜嘉班纳穿在脚上 这是我最爱的一双鞋
[00:37.26]有很多珍贵的东西 依然不能有任何畏惧 必须勇敢向前冲
[00:40.27]我曾生活在贫民窟 遇到的事情都很可怕
[00:43.07]我好像是从动物园来的 那里真是虫蚁鸟兽 什么都有
[00:46.06]1300号街区 碧池 我上一次官司就是在那里摊上的
[00:49.06]在这行业 没有第二次机会 所以我们不能按规矩来
[00:51.95]像理发师一样手握利刃 格洛克手枪会帮他除掉面部毛发
[00:54.80]发现他坐在车里毫无防备 如今大家都找不到他的头在哪儿
[00:57.78]Lil Hop Out 他一往无前 他只知道向前冲
[01:00.75]子弹飞出去 准确命中目标 让他们看看激光瞄准是什么样
[01:03.62]在酒水店里贩卖那些狂热分子喜欢的东西
[01:06.53]曾经收入微薄 如今过着梦寐以求的生活
[01:09.49]天生的挣钱大师 兄弟 炫富是我的强项
[01:12.40]掏出百元大钞炫耀一下 看看这些歌多么优秀
[01:15.34]是匪帮 也是大富豪 宝贝 我想做什么做什么
[01:18.28]我身边有很多用枪的狠人 我不在乎你要做什么
[01:21.21]像勇士队一样无畏 我的兄弟们都会勇猛冲锋
[01:24.07]他会尝到失败的滋味 我也失去了一些兄弟
[01:27.12]我认识一个漂亮妞 我是她的主人
[01:29.90]我刚在瓦菲商城买了一条古巴链 碧池 这些钻石都是新买的
[01:32.59]//
[01:32.93]把我和我的金银珠宝埋在一起 就像法老一样
[01:35.84]始终带着杀手 想要抢劫我 你不该这样做
[01:38.81]我联系Johnny Dang 给我的金牙镶了点钻石
[01:41.51]FN手枪唱起了歌 好像它是灵魂乐团的领唱
[01:44.40]不要来到这里 好像我们是朋友 你知道我不认识你
[01:47.56]你知道我心中有恶魔 让我给你看看吧
[01:50.43]最近我一直在演出 
[01:51.81]//
[01:51.97]一场接一场
[01:53.19]我知道我让那些敌人都恨得牙痒痒
[01:55.98]我已经很久没有做街头生意了
[01:58.85]啊朋友再见 啊朋友再见 我们就此分别吧
[02:02.55]向天祈祷 希望我的钞票越来越多
[02:04.79]也祈祷有一天能彻底摆脱恶魔的纠缠
[02:07.61]//
[02:08.00]天生的挣钱大师 兄弟 炫富是我的强项
[02:10.99]掏出百元大钞炫耀一下 看看这些歌多么优秀
[02:13.81]是匪帮 也是大富豪 宝贝 我想做什么做什么
[02:16.79]我身边有很多用枪的狠人 我不在乎你要做什么
[02:19.76]像勇士队一样无畏 我的兄弟们都会勇猛冲锋
[02:22.63]他会尝到失败的滋味 我也失去了一些兄弟
[02:25.71]我认识一个漂亮妞 我是她的主人
[02:28.54]我刚在瓦菲商城买了一条古巴链 碧池 这些钻石都是新买的
